授業目的: Purpose of this course is for students to learn about innovation and its key role in building business. The course will introduce basic innovation concepts and subsequently product innovation through compelling case studies.
到達目標: At the end of the course, students will get intermediate to advanced understanding of product innovation strategies with successful examples through case studies and their own research on companies.
特記事項: 【合併】Product Innovation（経営戦略研究科）/Product Innovation（経営戦略研究科）

第1回: Understanding innovation through examples. Why Innovation? Need of Innovation for building business and stay competitive. Introduction to Types of Innovation. Sustaining, disruptive.
Reading Online resources and books. Pre-read about innovation. Find examples of innovative products or services in your daily life .. and bring to the class to share.
第2回: Understanding innovation through examples. Why Innovation? Need of Innovation for building business and stay competitive. Introduction to Types of Innovation. Sustaining, disruptive.
第3回: Examples and case studies of innovation with special emphasis to product innovation. Historic Examples of Product Innovation (Edison’s Miracle of Light, Wizard of Photography etc). Consumer product Innovation.
第4回: Examples and case studies of innovation with special emphasis to product innovation. Historic Examples of Product Innovation (Edison’s Miracle of Light, Wizard of Photography etc). Consumer product Innovation.
第5回: Why Product innovation, Product Innovation as a key business building strategy. Product Innovation frame-work. Innovation Funnel. Lean Innovation approach for effective product innovation.
第6回: Why Product innovation, Product Innovation as a key business building strategy. Product Innovation frame-work. Innovation Funnel. Lean Innovation approach for effective product innovation.
第7回: Customer centric approach to product Innovation. Introduction to Jobs to be Done (JTBD). Management strategies for a successful Product Innovation. Leadership Issues and Challenges.
第8回: Customer centric approach to product Innovation. Introduction to Jobs to be Done (JTBD). Management strategies for a successful Product Innovation. Leadership Issues and Challenges.
第9回: Innovation Management System and its role (i) in accelerating the product innovation to market. (ii) Organization Development for Innovation (iii) Identifying Opportunities. Case Studies.
第10回: Innovation Management System and its role (i) in accelerating the product innovation to market. (ii) Organization Development for Innovation (iii) Identifying Opportunities. Case Studies.
第11回: Open Innovation as a key strategy for accelerated product innovation. Case Studies and examples and tools.
第12回: Open Innovation as a key strategy for accelerated product innovation. Case Studies and examples and tools.
第13回: Future Vision of Product Innovation How product innovation will evolve in the new digital era.
第14回: Future Vision of Product Innovation How product innovation will evolve in the new digital era.
